meanings.definition: Relating to the measurement of mental traits or abilities.
meanings.sent1: The psychometrically test evaluated her intelligence.
meanings.sent2: The researchers used psychometrically sound methods to assess cognitive skills.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his psychometrically measured IQ was off the charts.
meanings.sent4: Her psychometrically determined memory was like a steel trap.
meanings.sent5: The psychometrically precise results left no room for doubt.
